name: Bunny in a Volcano
description:
Help the bunny escape the erupting volcano! The bunny is extremely energetic at times, which makes it very tired in between. Make sure you make the hops count! 

If you hit a platform on your way up you'll get a boost if you are close enough to the edge.

Control with A and D despite what the game says. The badges underneath the bunny indicate if the bunny will jump or not the next period. Each period is 2 seconds.

Team:

One man team which is why there is no sounds and no art to speak of. Just had a good time doing an out-of-control platformer in Unity.
